name: Fritz Bee
description:
Story:
While Fritz, a beekeeper, was playing with his dog, mutan bees came out from nowhere and started to destroy the city. Fritz decided to fight the bees with the only weapon near him, his frisbee.

You'll play as Fritz and he'll kill every enemies with frisbees and special frisbees.
Good luck!

Credits:
